title: Fully Furnished Luxury Villa For Sale at Ruskin Island
details:
Fully Furnished Luxury Villa For Sale at Ruskin Island

4 Bedrooms - Two bedrooms with the added space of a mezzanine floor and attached baths, two bedrooms with an attached bath and a master bedroom with a Jacuzzi® and attached bath. The driveway overlooks a spacious front yard and an outdoor lounge area perched in the shade of an old tree on a tiny island of its own, sat in the most surrounding the villa.

There are separate quarters for drivers and domestic help on the property.

The wet kitchen and pantry are outfitted with industry standard appliances.
